summary: Tested iteration 26 features: KaizerFit spacing, Dark mode visibility, Landing page Telugu translations, and Live Chat rooms. All 4 feature areas tested and working correctly.

minor.issue: WebSocket connection shows brief disconnect-reconnect cycle but recovers successfully

issues: Dark mode via system preference (prefers-color-scheme) doesn't automatically apply to landing page - requires user toggle after login

passed_tests: KaizerFit page - 'Start Live' and 'Record Fitness' buttons visible and clickable
KaizerFit page - Gap between buttons and Connect Smartwatch card is 20px (mt-2 applied correctly)
KaizerFit page - Connect Smartwatch card properly styled with violet gradient in dark mode
Dark mode - Dashboard body background rgb(8, 12, 22) - proper dark color
Dark mode - Dashboard text color rgb(248, 250, 252) - proper light/white text for visibility
Dark mode - 'dark' class properly applied to html element
Dark mode - Theme toggle button works on dashboard header
Landing page - Telugu translations working: దమ్మాయిగూడ, సమస్యలు, ప్రారంభించు
Landing page - Language toggle button working (EN/తె)
Landing page - All 6 feature cards displayed correctly
Landing page - Quick links section (Dump Yard, Expenditure, Polls, Issues) visible
Landing page - 33 elements with dark mode CSS classes found
Live Chat - /api/chat/rooms returns 3 seeded rooms (general, announcements, health-fitness)
Live Chat - All 3 rooms visible in UI with data-testid selectors
Live Chat - Chat room opens with input field visible
Live Chat - WebSocket connection establishes (shows 'online' status)
critical_code_review_comments: KaizerFit.jsx mt-2 margin class correctly applied to Connect Smartwatch wrapper div (line 361)
index.css dark mode CSS variables properly defined with good contrast ratios
LandingPage.jsx has proper dark:text-white and dark:bg-gray-* classes for dark mode support
LiveChat.jsx properly implements WebSocket with fallback to REST API
seed_data_creation: Chat rooms seeded via /api/chat/seed: general, announcements, health-fitness
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified: 1) KaizerFit spacing - 20px gap between buttons and smartwatch card (mt-2 class), 2) Dark mode - working with proper text visibility (light text on dark bg), 3) Telugu translations working on landing page, 4) Live Chat - 3 rooms available and accessible via /live-chat route. WebSocket connects but shows brief disconnect-reconnect which recovers.
